### Exercise 2
```{r  error=TRUE}
a <- c(1); b <- c(0); c <- c(-1)

test<-(b^2 - 4*a*c)
root <- NULL

if(test<0){
  stop("there is no real roots")
}else{
  if(a==0){
    root <- -c/b
}else{
  if(test==0){
  root <- -b/2*a
}else if(test >0){
  root <- (-b+sqrt(test)*c(-1,1))/2*a
}
}
  print (root)
}





```
